page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content:
{A Day in my Life by Richard Jackson I am 11 years old and have been a pupil at Cotherstone School since I was 4\ years old. I live at Hayberries Farm and my parents own and run the Rose and Crown Hotel at Romaldkirk. I get up at 7.30 am wash & dress and have breakfast. From 8 am I watch TV until 8.40 am then my Mum or Dad takes me to wait for my school taxi. Earlier my sister Juliet, who is 12 years old, leaves to catch her bus to Teesdale Comprehensive School in Barnard Castle 7 miles away.
School begins at 9.00 am but many children keep arriving until 9.10 am as 70% of the pupils travel to school by taxi. There are about 50 of us.
